tool_description: An API for getting the latest news on Brazil's politics
name: PoliticaBR
title: PoliticaBR

api_list.name: Get news
api_list.description: This fetches and serves the titles and URLs of latest political news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://politicabr.p.rapidapi.com/politica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "politicabr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://politicabr.p.rapidapi.com/politica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "politicabr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
